synthesis_conditions.notes: Oxidation reaction of 2,2’-bipyridine-5,5’-dimethyl by KMnO4 according to literature procedure.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: 20 ml Teflon-lined stainless steel container, programmed oven
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: ligand bpdc (48 mg, 0.2 mmol), ZrCl4 (46.6 mg, 0.2 mmol), benzoic acid (1.5 g)
synthesis_conditions.notes: Benzoic acid added as the modulate agent. Mixture stirred for 30 minutes at ambient conditions before heating.
Sample treated by Soxhlet extraction using ethanol as the extraction agent, then activated by heating under vacuum.
